Info

Defines class SplashProperty with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates an API for checking splash property.

class ats_utilities.splash.splash_property.SplashProperty(prop: Dict[Any, Any], verbose: bool = False)[source]¶

Bases: ATSChecker

Defines class SplashProperty with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates an API for checking splash property. Splash screen property API.

It defines:

attributes:
_EXPECTED_PROP_KEYS - Expected property names.
_verbose - Enable/Disable verbose option.
_property - Splash property in dict format.
methods:
__init__ - Initials SplashProperty constructor.
validation - Validates splash property.
_EXPECTED_PROP_KEYS: List[str] = ['ats_organization', 'ats_repository', 'ats_name', 'ats_logo_path', 'ats_use_github_infrastructure']¶
validate(verbose: bool = False) → bool[source]¶

Validates splash property.

Parameters:

verbose (<bool>) – Enable/Disable verbose option

Returns:

True (property ok) else False

Return type:

<bool>

Exceptions:

None
